tasks.title: Complete project proposal
tasks.description: Write and submit the Q4 project proposal for the new marketing campaign. Include budget estimates and timeline.

tasks.title: Schedule annual health checkup
tasks.description: Call the clinic to schedule yearly physical examination and dental cleaning.

tasks.title: Review investment portfolio
tasks.description: Meet with financial advisor to review current investments and discuss retirement planning options.

tasks.title: Buy groceries
tasks.description: Get items for the week: milk, eggs, bread, vegetables, fruits, chicken, and pasta.

tasks.title: Learn React hooks
tasks.description: Complete the online course on advanced React hooks including useReducer, useContext, and custom hooks.

tasks.title: Fix leaking faucet
tasks.description: Call plumber or watch DIY tutorial and fix the kitchen sink faucet that's been dripping.

tasks.title: Book flight tickets
tasks.description: Book round-trip tickets to San Francisco for the tech conference. Check for early bird discounts.

tasks.title: Team meeting preparation
tasks.description: Prepare slides and data analysis for Monday's team meeting. Review last quarter's performance metrics.

tasks.title: Update resume
tasks.description: Add recent projects and achievements to resume. Update LinkedIn profile with new skills.

tasks.title: Organize home office
tasks.description: Declutter desk, organize cables, and set up better lighting for video calls.
